## GenerateHeaderOptions variable

Enumerates the data grid auto generated header options default option generates a non-sticky header row

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
GenerateHeaderOptions: {
    readonly none: "none";
    readonly default: "default";
    readonly sticky: "sticky";
}
```
